channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Current mortgage rates report for Aug. 29, 2025: Rates flicker slightly up after dip
item.description: Compare average mortgage rates on different types of home loans so you can pick the best mortgage for your needs as you house shop.

item.title: Trump orders federal buildings to be built as Classical architecture

item.title: Denver school's all-gender bathrooms violate Title IX, Education Department finds
item.description: The U.S. Department of Education said on Thursday that it found Denver Public Schools violated Title IX by establishing all-gender bathrooms.

item.title: ‘Undercover’ Spy At Center Of WSJ Sob Story Is Actually A Public CIA Russia Hoaxer
item.description: The hit piece blasting Intelligence Chief Tulsi Gabbard for outing omnipresent CIA agent Julia Gurganus is filled with falsities.

item.title: Obama slams Trump's use of National Guard to help cities fight crime as 'dangerous trend'
item.description: Obama criticized Trump's threats to deploy National Guard troops in Chicago and New York, calling the policies a risk to all Americans' freedoms.

item.title: Fox News Politics Newsletter: Documents reveal Obama’s role in Trump–Russia probe
item.description: Welcome to the Fox News Politics newsletter, with the latest updates on the Trump administration, Capitol Hill and more Fox News politics content.

item.title: The Green Economy Is Rife with Fraud
item.description: A multimillionaire Democratic donor’s guilty plea raises broader questions about corruption in environmentalist schemes like carbon-offset trading.

item.title: The Bolton Investigation Reportedly Involves More Than the Old Controversy over His Memoir
item.description: Even if the claims are true, it doesn’t make it less petty to pursue a criminal investigation against him.

item.title: The Trump Administration’s Very Online Celebrities Are Its Biggest Headaches
item.description: Appointees who represent the biggest departures from convention are the squeakiest wheels, and not in a good way.

item.title: Trump signs memorandum to strengthen rules around political lobbying, federal grant-making
item.description: President Trump on Thursday tightened up the rules for political lobbying related to federal grant-making.

item.title: Media Who Partake In ‘Transgender’ Pronoun Delusions Of Minneapolis Shooter Are Part Of The Problem
item.description: The media's willingness to indulge and promote transgenderism exposes their complicity in normalizing a sick and unnatural ideology.

item.title: Trump ends collective bargaining with unions tied to agencies with national security missions
item.description: President Trump on Thursday ended collective bargaining with several federal unions with national security missions.

item.title: CNN, NYT, USA Today All Publish Stories About Shooter Without Mentioning His Trans Identity
item.description: The propaganda press ignores the key transgender angle and makes the shooting about God or 'conservative activists.'

item.title: New home inventory is at its highest level since just before the housing market collapse that led to the Great Recession, but that doesn’t mean it’s the same market
item.description: Since roughly 2022, ResiClub co-founder Lance Lambert told Fortune, "the national power dynamic has slowly been shifting from sellers to buyers."
